    Correlation clustering algorithms
    de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.utilities.datastructures.histogram
    Classes for computing histograms.
  • Classes in de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.utilities.datastructures.histogram used by de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.correlation 
    Class and Description
    DoubleDynamicHistogram
    A flexible histogram storing double, that can dynamically adapt the number of bins to the data fed into the histogram.
